languages.text: "Да не наложена будет профанная длань на машину священную, что недугом поражена. Оградить механизм надлежит от забот мирских завесью литаний праведных и чтить его славно, покуда хворь не изыдет".

"'Let no profane hand touch the sacred machine stricken. Let the mechanism be shielded from all worldly troubles by a veil of righteous litany, and let its shrine be thricely honoured 'til the malady is no more.'"
languages.original_text: "Да не наложена будет профанная длань на машину священную, что недугом поражена. Оградить механизм надлежит от забот мирских завесью литаний праведных и чтить его славно, покуда хворь не изыдет".

"'Let no profane hand touch the sacred machine stricken. Let the mechanism be shielded from all worldly troubles by a veil of righteous litany, and let its shrine be thricely honoured 'til the malady is no more.'"

languages.text: « Qu'aucune main impie ne touche la machine sacrée incommodée. Que le mécanisme soit protégé de tous les maux séculiers par un voile de pieuse litanie, et que son autel soit triplement honoré le temps de sa convalescence. »
languages.original_text: "'Let no profane hand touch the sacred machine stricken. Let the mechanism be shielded from all worldly troubles by a veil of righteous litany, and let its shrine be thricely honoured 'til the malady is no more.'"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'aucune main impie ne touche la machine sacrée incommodée. Que le mécanisme soit protégé de tous les maux séculiers par un voile de pieuse litanie, et que son autel soit triplement honoré le temps de sa convalescence. »

languages.text: «"Que ninguna mano profana toque la máquina sagrada afligida. Que su mecanismo esté protegido de todos los pesares mundanos con un velo de letanía fervorosa, y que su santuario se honre tres veces hasta que desaparezca la enfermedad"».
languages.original_text: "'Let no profane hand touch the sacred machine stricken. Let the mechanism be shielded from all worldly troubles by a veil of righteous litany, and let its shrine be thricely honoured 'til the malady is no more.'"

traits.locale_text: «"Que ninguna mano profana toque la máquina sagrada afligida. Que su mecanismo esté protegido de todos los pesares mundanos con un velo de letanía fervorosa, y que su santuario se honre tres veces hasta que desaparezca la enfermedad"».

languages.text: “不要让充满亵渎的手触碰神圣的机器。让正义的祈祷之幕将机器笼罩其中，让它远离俗世的一切烦恼，让它的神龛得到三倍的尊崇，直至疾病消失为止。”
languages.original_text: "'Let no profane hand touch the sacred machine stricken. Let the mechanism be shielded from all worldly troubles by a veil of righteous litany, and let its shrine be thricely honoured 'til the malady is no more.'"

traits.locale_text: “不要让充满亵渎的手触碰神圣的机器。让正义的祈祷之幕将机器笼罩其中，让它远离俗世的一切烦恼，让它的神龛得到三倍的尊崇，直至疾病消失为止。”

languages.text: 「不敬な手で聖なる機械を触らないでくれ。機械を正義のヴェールの聖歌でこの世の全ての悪から守り、病気がなくなるまで、その祠を三度祀りなさい」
languages.original_text: "'Let no profane hand touch the sacred machine stricken. Let the mechanism be shielded from all worldly troubles by a veil of righteous litany, and let its shrine be thricely honoured 'til the malady is no more.'"

traits.locale_text: 「不敬な手で聖なる機械を触らないでくれ。機械を正義のヴェールの聖歌でこの世の全ての悪から守り、病気がなくなるまで、その祠を三度祀りなさい」

languages.text: "'Keine profane Hand darf die befallene heilige Maschine berühren. Schütztet den Mechanismus vor sämtlichen weltlichen Sorgen durch einen Schleier der rechtschaffenen Litanei, und ehret seinen Schrein dreifach, bis die Krankheit verflogen ist.'"
languages.original_text: "'Let no profane hand touch the sacred machine stricken. Let the mechanism be shielded from all worldly troubles by a veil of righteous litany, and let its shrine be thricely honoured 'til the malady is no more.'"

traits.locale_text: "'Keine profane Hand darf die befallene heilige Maschine berühren. Schütztet den Mechanismus vor sämtlichen weltlichen Sorgen durch einen Schleier der rechtschaffenen Litanei, und ehret seinen Schrein dreifach, bis die Krankheit verflogen ist.'"

languages.text: "'Kutsal makineye hiçbir dinsiz elinin dokunmasına müsaade etme. Mekanizmanın erdemli bir ilahinin örtüsü altında tüm dünyevi dertlerden korunmasını sağla ki illetlerin kökü kuruyana dek üç misli onurla ışıldasın.'"
languages.original_text: "'Let no profane hand touch the sacred machine stricken. Let the mechanism be shielded from all worldly troubles by a veil of righteous litany, and let its shrine be thricely honoured 'til the malady is no more.'"
